paramInformation.label: Button Mode Switching
paramInformation.description: This parameter sets the mode for the wall switch inputs

metadata.inclusion: Press 3 times within 2 seconds or turn on the wall switch 3 times within 2 seconds.
metadata.exclusion: Press 3 times within 2 seconds or turn on the wall switch 3 times within 2 seconds.
metadata.reset:
1. Power off first.
2. Press program switch and power on for 10 seconds.
